Key Match Events: Virat Kohli scored an unbeaten 103 off 97 balls.
Jasprit Bumrah took 2 wickets for 41 runs.
Ravindra Jadeja took 2 wickets for 38 runs.
India won by 7 wickets with 51 balls remaining.
Pre-Game Insights: Bangladesh won the toss and elected to bat first.
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli was named Player of the Match for his unbeaten 103 runs.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was held at Maharashtra Cricket Association Stadium, Pune.
India earned 2 points from the match while Bangladesh earned 0 points.
